name: The great depression
text: As the financial bubble bursts because of [Overproduction], the stockmarket has crashed hard.

choices.text: We need as much aid as possible
We need new jobs for the people.
I wish we could do something!

name: Wasteful Habits
text: [Overproduction] meant disposability. And it has found its way into our people's mentality.

choices.text: Bad habit die hard, but it must die.

name: Goods Shortage
text: The shelves are running out of goods. [Underproduction] had its effect on our people's daily lives.

choices.text: We must stabilise the production of necessary goods.
I wish we could do something!

name: Machine Shortage
text: Even though theres enough incentive to build new factories, [Underproduction] slowed our industrial growth!

choices.text: If we could just buy it, why should we produce it?
Leave it be for a while.
